summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water Face Mist for sensitive skin soothes and refreshes the skin and is rich in minerals that provide antioxidant benefits.
details: DetailsBenefitsIntensely soothing face mist gently refreshes and tones skin on the face and bodyFeatures a high concentration of mineral salts and trace elementsProvides protection against environmental free radicals with the natural antioxidant seleniumSourced from the French town of La Roche-Posay, this exclusive thermal spring water has been used at the La Roche-Posay Thermal Center, Europe's leading center of thermal dermatology, since 1905Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive skinSuitable for adults, children and babiesNon-comedogenicDermatologist testedKey IngredientsSelenium is a powerful, natural, mineral-rich antioxidant that provides immediate, intense soothingLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensAdditivesItem 2615026How To UseFace mist spray can be used as the last step in cleansing or first step in caring to tone and refresh skin. After a mild cleansing, spray 8 to 12 inches from face then leave on 2-3 minutes. Gently pat off excess spray without rubbing. Use as often as desired, at home, at the office, or on the go.IngredientsAqua/Water.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Face mist spray can be used as the last step in cleansing or first step in caring to tone and refresh skin. After a mild cleansing, spray 8 to 12 inches from face then leave on 2-3 minutes. Gently pat off excess spray without rubbing. Use as often as desired, at home, at the office, or on the go.

reviews.headline: Expected it to Do Nothing
reviews.comments: I was originally expecting to return this product, i figured it wouldn't do much but it did actually help during some of my reactive moments. I wouldn't say it's "intensely soothing" like the description says but definitely medium level assistance. It has even helped me when I've had redness/itching due exposure to an allergen. It reduced the redness and stopped the itching. I wasn't even following directions properly (never patted or wiped the product off). I recommend trying it out.

reviews.headline: First step to apply Makeup
reviews.comments: This is a refreshing spray that helps with applying your toners and makeup..

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: Love this product!!

reviews.headline: Good but defective packaging
reviews.comments: Great for setting or prepping skin before makeup or just to keep it hydrated throughout the day. The only bad thing is the spray bottle. As many others have stated the bozzle stip working halfway therefore you dont get your mineys worth. Please fix this!!

reviews.headline: Love the product, BUT the spray stopped working
reviews.comments: I really love how refreshing and soothing this thermal water is. However, I'm really disappointed that the spray nozzle stopped working even though the bottle is still more than half full. No water comes out anymore, no matter how much I shake or press it. For the price, I expected better packaging. Hoping this was just a defect, but it's frustrating to waste so much product.

reviews.headline: Pass on this
reviews.comments: Major burn and irritation. Returned the next day!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: This is the best thermal spray on the market! If you have sensitive skin use this! It's worth every penny. There's no fragrance and it leaves your skin feeling fresh! I've been using it for 11 years now. I'll never change.

reviews.headline: Leaves the skin refresh
reviews.comments: I use every time I wash my face!

reviews.headline: Not sure if I would buy again
reviews.comments:
Serves it's purpose of a nice cool spritz but seems to tighten and feels like it causes a little stinging for me. 
Would recommend but with a little caution.

reviews.headline: Super refreshing!!
reviews.comments: This has become my favorite mist because it leaves my skin feeling so hydrated and healthy! It is also a very fine mist that covers my face evenly. I like to apply it directly after washing my face to prep for all of my other products.

reviews.headline: Life changing
reviews.comments: Of all the products I use… this is the one my skin can't live without!  It is so healing and hydrating it sets my skin up for success! Whenever my skin is in need of healing this is my go to. It's also life changing on a burn! You will not regret it!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: Best product for my skincare routine. Makes my moisturizer work 100% better. If i run out of this i need to restock immediately its a non-negotiable item in my daily routine. I use it night and day before my moisturiser. Never experienced any irritation or strong smell from this product. The best addition to my routine.

reviews.headline: Essential for skincare
reviews.comments: This helps my skincare absorb wayyy better versus just dry skin. I wake up with such plump skin with spraying this and then serum and moisturizer

reviews.headline: Unexpected
reviews.comments:
Unexpected
Disappointed with this product. The applicator should come out as a light mist, but it comes out like a watering can, leaving the skin soaked.

reviews.headline: Worked properly until half way through the bottle
reviews.comments: Bottle sprayed mist until it was about half empty and now it sprays a straight stream of water.

reviews.headline: A drink for my skin in the sun.
reviews.comments: I used this up last year while sitting in the sunshine. I use it all over my body as it keeps my skin moist and cooled off while tanning. Maybe that's not what it's actually for, but it felt like a delicious treat for my skin. I will buy it again this year just for that purpose! And for my face of course. :)

reviews.headline: Nice but slightly disappointed
reviews.comments: Worked well, but with still several ounces left, the nozzle stopped working.  I was told I couldn't exchange for a travel size.  I bought the Evian brand and have not had any issues.

reviews.headline: ALLERGIC REACTION
reviews.comments: It lists water as the only ingredient, but this caused me to have a severe allergic reaction all over my face that couldn't have been caused by anything else. I would NEVER buy this again, and i normally love all their products

reviews.headline: I loved
reviews.comments: Is a great product

reviews.headline: Love their products but…..
reviews.comments: I was recommended this by an influencer and I don't know why. It does and feels like nothing. I actually like the Thayers spray better

media.headline: Refresh & Awaken Your Skin Throughout The Day!
media.caption: A true gem added to my daily skincare routine

faceoff_positive.comments: I have tested a variety of facial mists/sprays and this is definitely the best one. Especially for my super sensitive skin. It doesn't sting my face! It's a great way to refresh throughout the day when you notice your skin needs a bit of boost of hydration. I use it all the time. My morning routine, evening routine and through out the day, especially post workout sessions. Love, love, love it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Facial Spray

faceoff_negative.comments: This item feels nice and does not leave a sticky residue behind. It dries down and leaves well...nothing. It feels like water in a can. I am in my late 30's and do not have any significant wrinkles and little sun damage. I do however have skin that tends to be sensitive and on the dryer side at times. I use Retin-A 1% cream often in my night routine. So, I like to have sprays around to refresh. Also, for summer usage and purposes. I currently am in summer in a warmer location and this has felt nice. However, there is nothing magic and there are other products that are the same ingredients for less cost. It did not break me out or irritate my skin, which is a plus. If you want to splurge on this then go for it, but to me it just was not worth it. Spring water in a glass spray bottle with a fine mister could do the same.
faceoff_negative.headline: This item feels nice...
